============================================
example : An awesome project.
============================================

This is an awesome project.

Tutorials
===========

See the following IPython Notebooks for some examples of using `example`:
There should be demo.html file in docs/notebooks/demo.html.
The demo html is created from demo.ipynb file.

* `Basic Demo <http://htmlpreview.github.io/?https://github.com/bhishanpdl/example/blob/master/docs/notebooks/demo.html>`_

API Documentation
===================

`example` provides a `MyClass` class object, that builds on the
`scipy.stats` to to various things.


The MyClass Class
--------------------
.. automodule:: src
    :members:
    :undoc-members:

------------------------
